timetable.create

Class CreateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • timetable.create.CreateController

  • public class CreateController
extends java.lang.Object
    Create controller or Create companion This class dynamically loads Fxml files when when of the buttons is clicked (Student button, Teacher button and Loaction Button). these files contain a table view
    Author:
    Tibo Vanheule

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close stage, if no alert is open.
      void create()
      Function to create a new student, teacher or location. and adds it to the table
      void delete(Item item)
      Display an alert, then if user pressed ok, delete the selected teacher, location or student
      void initialize()
      intialization, setup of the buttons
      void menu()
      Go back to the menu, let user choose between a teacher, location and a student.
      private void page(java.lang.String sort)
      Function that loads correct Fxml and sets up the table and fill the table
      void setStageAndSetupListeners(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Controller mainController)
      Setup of stage maincontrooler and model fields.
      private void updateName(Item item, java.lang.String name)
      Function update a name of a location student or teacher when a editCommit happens.
